Our scouts gave up their lives for this information.

The report revealed the location of the bastion entrance and gave us the name of their commander—{@LinkCreature:487#101}.

Get your final briefing from {@LinkCreature:203#1006} in {@Rgn:3005}, and then get in there.

Centurion {@LinkCreature:203#1007} sent you? Good.

One of our scouts, {@LinkCreature:203#1033}, is in place outside the bastion. He'll point out the entrance. Once you're inside, find {@LinkCreature:487#1111}.

Let's take the fight to the Scions!
Hold it right there!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I'm on your side."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Sorry, . I'm in a lot of pain, but my eyes are still sharp.

The entrance is over to the right from here. Take the path on my left to the cave entrance. I've seen the enemies going in and out, probably via a teleportal. Grapine's inside in disguise.

Those wretches killed most of my unit—don't be gentle with them!

The Scions are amassing weapons and power. I don't know the whole plan, but Murdranak thinks he's going to govern Arcadia in the name of someone else.

How did things get so bad?"Why do they amass this power?"

I've heard too many stories to say for certain, but the most credible ones talk about a ritual—an apotheosis.

Beware, —{@LinkCreature:487#101#Murdranak} commands a {@LinkCreature:487#3006#bloodbound vulcan}.

You'll need to kill the golem {@LinkCreature:487#1006#Soulcrusher} blocking the way first.

Their deaths bring me great comfort.

Dismissed!
